name: Garbage Kings
description:
Garbage Kings is a MIDI-controller controlled game.

I did not participate in the creation of this game. For background information refer to the official Garbage Kings GGJ submission website. I merely created a Windows Build so people who can't run Unity can test it and am distributing it based on the Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 Creative Commons license (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/). See Global Game Jam terms.

You can see gameplay at 10:00 in the following video:

Description from the GGJ page: 

Play as a household of raccoons. Get to the garbage site and get some food goodies to bring back home to your raccoon family.
